GSP33mbrahsiu:3: kecidaprāmāṇyaṃ manyante, ātmanaḥ pramāṇāntarasiddhatve teṣāmanuvādakatvam, asiddhatve saṃbandhāgrahaṇāt, apadārthatve
GSP33mbrahsiu:8: parāṃ ca devatāṃ guṇābhidhānalakṣaṇayā stutyā kāyavāṅmanaḥprahvatālakṣaṇayā ca praṇatyā pūjayati
GSP33mbrahsiu:14: rāganibandhanā ca pravṛttiḥ saṃsārabījamiti na muktaye syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:17: tasmātsakaladuḥkhātige brahmatattve duḥkhebhya udvignaḥ sukhebhyaśca vītarāgaḥ pravartamāno mucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:30: yatrāpi duḥkhavigamaḥ, tatrāpi na tanmātrameva sukham,
GSP33mbrahsiu:33: na ca sa viśeṣavān, yena tadviśeṣāya tatsādhanaviśeṣo 'pekṣyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:36: yadāpi nānyadduḥkhaṃ nivartyam, tadāpi kāmasya duḥkhātmakatvāttannibarhaṇarūpaṃ sukham
GSP33mbrahsiu:40: yatraiva kāmaḥ sa eva sukhayati viṣayaḥ, netaraḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:42: anyathā ya ekasya sukhaḥ sa sarvasya syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:43: kāmanivṛttyā tu sukhatve yatra yasya kāmo 'bhiruciḥ sa eva tasya sukha iti yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:46: uktaṃ hi ‘na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānāmupabhogena śāmyati'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:47: tathā ‘bhogābhyāsamanu vivardhante rāgāḥ, kauśalāni cendriyāṇām'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:48: viṣayadoṣadarśanādapi ca kāmanivṛttiḥ, tatropabhogatulya āhlādaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:49: samāne ca prārthitārthalābhe pramodabhedo na syāt, kāmanivṛtteraviśeṣāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:53: kāmātirekātprayasyantamavāpto 'rtho na tathā prīṇayati, yathāprārthito vinā prayāsādupanataḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:55: kleśādavāpto 'yamiti na tena tathā prīyate, yathānāśaṃsitopanatena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:56: kāmābhāvamātre ca sukhe 'kāmitaviṣayopabhoge na bhogāvasthāyāḥ pūrvāpare
GSP33mbrahsiu:59: bhogāvasthāyāṃ prabuddhādhvastakāma eveti cetpūrvā [KKS_3] parayorapi dvayoravasthayostarhi sukhī itaratra duḥkhītyanubhavaviruddhamāpadyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:60: aprāptaśca smaraṇaviparivartī viṣayaḥ kāmasyodbodhakaḥ, prāpto nivartakaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:62: na ca yatra kāmastatra sukham, manorathaśatārthitasyāpyupabhogena kasyacidduḥkhitvadarśanāt
GSP33mbrahsiu:66: yathā ca kasyacitkvacitkāmo jātibhedādinimittaḥ, tathā kiñcitkasyacitsukhamiti nāvyavasthā
GSP33mbrahsiu:67: api ca kāmanivṛttyāpi keciddūyante, tadabhāve viṣayopabhogasāmarthyābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:70: kimiti tarhi dūyante? anubhūtacarasya tajjanmanaḥ sukhasyāprāpteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:71: yathā pittādyupahatendriyā viśiṣṭebhyo 'nnapānebhyo nivṛttikāmāḥ, tathaiva kāmanivṛttyā tapyante
GSP33mbrahsiu:81: tattvadarśanavaimalyāttu tattve cetasaḥ prasādo 'bhirucirabhīcchā na rāgapakṣe vyavasthāpyate, yathā saṃsārāsāratātattvadarśananiṣpanno nodvegastato dveṣapakṣe /
GSP33mbrahsiu:84: api ca dṛṣṭaparotkarṣarāgibhyo 'pīndriyajaya upadiśyate sādhanatvena kāmādityāgātmakaḥ, tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:92: kartṛkarmabhāvaśca na kriyāṃ karaṇaṃ cāntareṇa yataḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:93: tataḥ ‘ānandaṃ brahma'; [KKS_4] iti ca na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:96: puruṣārthatvāya hi tatsaṃkīrtanam, asaṃvedyaśca kathaṃ puruṣārthaḥ? ucyate
GSP33mbrahsiu:99: pramāṇasya phalamarthāntaramanarthāntaraṃ vā sarvaparīkṣakaiḥ pratijñāyate prajñāyate ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:105: yathā ca kartaryātmanyasaṃvedye saṃvideva na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:109: na hyātmāsaṃvedyaḥ phale viṣaye cānusaṃdhātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:110: ananusaṃdhāne ca svaparasaṃvedyayoḥ ko 'tiśayaḥ? na ca saṃvedyaḥ, karmatve karturvyatirekaprasaṅgāt anātmatvaprasaṅgācca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:112: tathā brahmaṇaḥ svātmaprakāśasyānandasvabhāvo na saṃvedyaḥ, karmatvābhāvāt
GSP33mbrahsiu:115: tathā hi sarvakarmapratyastamayahetuka eva sa ucyate ‘yadāsya
GSP33mbrahsiu:122: na hi bhedodayavyayānāṃ nivṛttiḥ kiñcidvastu, yena dvaitamāvahet /
GSP33mbrahsiu:123: ānandaśca yadi bhāvaḥ, tasya dharmitve vijñānaṃ dharmaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:125: na hyekasya dve rūpe yujyete, virodhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:128: dharmo 'pi dharmiṇo na bhinnaḥ, bhede gavāśvavaddharmadharmibhāvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:136: kathaṃ cāparyāyaśabdābhidheya ekatvam? tasmādduḥkhoparama evānandaśabdasya brahmaṇyartha iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:138: viśiṣṭasyāhlādātmanaḥ prakāśasya cāndramasasyeva śabdadvayena pratipādanānna doṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:143: atha ca eka evābhyāmarthaviśeṣaḥ pratipādyate prakāśaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:144: na hi prakarṣo 'nyaḥ prakāśarūpātsavitari, na prakāśarūpo vā prakarṣāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:150: na hi svarūpataḥ paramatāsaṃbhave virodhyasaṃsargādupacaritā sā yuktā bhavitum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:152: evaṃ ca laukikānanda etasya mātreti yujyate, avacchedāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:158: sarvasyeyamātmāśīḥ kṛmerapi ‘mā na bhūvam, bhūyāsam'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:162: anye tu suṣupte ‘sukhamahamasvāpsam'; iti parāmarśādātmani sukhānubhavamāhuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:163: na hyananubhave parāmarśa evaṃ syāt, suṣuptābhyupagamaśca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:170: anyathābhāve 'vagate duḥkhoparamanimittaḥ sukhaśabda iti yujyate, anyathā mukhyārthataiva yuktā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:174_1: vṛttivirodhāt, dṛśyena ca draṣṭuranumānāt, dṛśyasya ca sukhaduḥkhamohabhedavacchabdādivibhāgopalabdheḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:178: ‘indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyate'; iti vyaktameva nānārūpāvagamo
GSP33mbrahsiu:180: tatra kathamekatvamupacaritamiti vaktuṃ śakyam? tathā vyakto nānātvaniṣedhaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:186: ‘ya iha nāneva paśyati'; iti ivaśabdena prakāśito nopacarita ekatve 'vakalpate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:187: kāmamupacārādastvekatvam, na tu bhāvikasya nānātvasya nivṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:193: sā hi sādhyasādhanādivibhāgaṃ nivartayantī sarvatra cātmābhimānamāvirbhāvayantī tadvirodhinī syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:194: tathā hi sarvato nivṛttasya niḥśreyasamityavisaṃvādaḥ (corrected; api saṃvādaḥ -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:196: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati, yathā ‘aho darśanīyā, aho
GSP33mbrahsiu:203: ekasminnapyātmani sarvagate śarīraparimāṇe 'ṇuparimāṇe vā kalpitabhedanibandhanā bhogavyavasthā dṛśyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:204: pāde me vedanā, śirasi me vedanā --- iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:206: na hi pādasya śiraso vā vedanayābhisaṃbandhaḥ, ajñatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:213: api ca tatrāpi na pradeśaḥ pradeśāntaravedanāmanusaṃdadhāti, tathehāpi na jīvo jīvāntaravedanāmanusaṃdadhātīti samānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:217: eko 'pyātmā pradeśaiḥ sukhaduḥkhādibhiryujyamānastatra baddha iva itaratra mukta iva ca gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:218: yathā malīmase darpaṇatale malīmasaṃ mukhaṃ viśuddhe viśuddhaṃ darpaṇarahitaṃ ca gamyamānaṃ tadupādhidoṣāsaṃpṛktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:220: kalpanā pratipattuḥ pratyayasya dharmo na vastu vyavasthāpayitumalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:221: na khalu pratipattuḥ pratyayamanu viparivartante vastūni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:228: kalpito 'pi cāhidaṃśo maraṇakāryāya kalpate, pratisūryakaśca prakāśakāryāya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:229: yadapi dṛśyenaiva draṣṭuranumānāddraṣṭṛdṛśyayorbhedaḥ, dṛśyasya ca sukhādibhedopalabdhernānātvamiti, tadapyasat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:235: api ca ekatva evāyaṃ draṣṭṛdṛśyabhāvo 'vakalpate, draṣṭureva cidātmanastathā tathā vipariṇāmādvivartanādvā
GSP33mbrahsiu:239: ekāntaḥkaraṇasaṃkrāntāvastyeva sambandha iti cet, na, citeḥ śuddhatvādapariṇāmādapratisaṃkramācca
GSP33mbrahsiu:240: dṛśyā buddhiścitisannidhestacchāyayā vivartata iti cet, atha keyaṃ tacchāyatā? atadātmanastadavabhāsaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:250: citestu vibhaktamasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ tayā cetyata iti duravagamam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:258: anādinidhanatve hi nāpaneyaṃ nopaneyaṃ vā kiñcidastīti tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo vyarthāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:259: tathā hi vidyāsvabhāvaṃ cet, na kiñcinnivartavyamavāptavyaṃ vā syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:265: na ca śāstrāṇāṃ muktyarthānāṃ ca pravṛttīnāṃ vaiyarthyam, avidyāyā nivartyatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:267: na brūmo 'nādernoccheda iti, kiṃ tu nityasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvasya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:268: [KKS_9] athāvidyā na brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ, arthāntaraṃ brahmaṇa āpadyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:269: na vā syāt, tatra kiṃ nivartyam? atha matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:270: agrahaṇamavidyā, sā kathamarthāntaraṃ syāt? na cānivartyā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:275: na ca brahmaṇo 'nyo 'sti, yasya tattvāgrahaṇaṃ brahmaṇi prayatnalabhyayā vidyayā nivartyeta
GSP33mbrahsiu:278: yasya tu viparyayagrahaṇamavidyā, tasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvaścetsa nityaḥ kathaṃ nivartyeta? asvabhāvaścedarthāntaramāpadyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:280: brahmaṇa eveti cet, vipratiṣedhaḥ, tasya vidyāsvarūpatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:283: nāvidyā brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ, nārthāntaram, nātyantamasatī, nāpi satī /
GSP33mbrahsiu:285: svabhāvaścetkasyacit, anyo 'nanyo vā paramārtha eveti nāvidyā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:298: avabhāsamānaṃ rūpaṃ mā bhūt, avabhāsastu sanneva, sa cāvidyeti gīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:307: evaṃ ca nādvaitahānam, na nivartanīyasyābhāvo vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:315: kasya punaḥ kalpanā bhedikā? na tāvad brahmaṇaḥ, tasya vidyātmanaḥ kalpanāśūnyatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:330: ‘prayojanamanuddiśya na mando 'pi pravartate'; iti, tatra parasya brahmaṇaḥ prapañcasargaprayojanaṃ vācyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:337: tathā ‘puruṣasya viśuddhasya nāśuddhā vikṛtirbhavet'; ityapi prayuktamavidyānibandhane sargavibhāge
GSP33mbrahsiu:341: na hi māyākārasya vividhaṃ prapañcaṃ [KKS_11] darśayato
GSP33mbrahsiu:343: citrapustādikṛtāṃ vā vikalāvikalādibhedena citrāṇi tāni tāni kurvatām,
GSP33mbrahsiu:344: bālānāṃ ca mṛṇmayādibhiḥ pratikṛtibhedairvicitraiḥ krīḍatāṃ na teṣu kiñcidvaiṣamyaṃ nairghṛṇyaṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:345: karmāśayānurodhena ca vidadhato vaicitryaṃ na doṣa ityācāryāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:351: dravāṇāṃ cāpāṃ karakādiḥ kaṭhino vikāraḥ, tathācetanasya gomayasya cetano
GSP33mbrahsiu:362: tathā ca ‘svapnādivadavidyāyāḥ pravṛttistasya kiṅkṛtā'; iti pratyuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:365: api ca pārthivānāmaṇūnāṃ śyāmatānādiḥ pākajena varṇena nivartyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:367: aikātmyavādinastvanāgantukārthasya tadabhāvātkuto nivṛttiḥ? na khalvātmasvabhāva eva vidyā avidyānivartikā, avidyāyāstayā saha vṛtteravirodhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:369: na ca vidyāntaramāgantukaṃ virodhi nivartakam, aikātmyavāde vyatiriktasya tasyāyogāt, āgantukasya brahmasvabhāvatvānupapatteśca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:380: atha brahmaiva saṃsarati brahmaiva mucyate, ekamuktau sarvamuktiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:381: yato bhedadarśanena brahmaiva saṃsarati, abhedadarśanena ca mucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:387: avyatireke 'pi ca brahmaṇo jīvānāṃ bimbapratibimbavadvidyāvidyāvyavasthā vyākhyātā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:390: katham? yo 'yaṃ śravaṇamananapūrvako dhyānābhyāsaḥ pratiṣiddhākhilabhedaprapañce ‘sa eṣa neti neti'ātmani, sa vyaktameva bhedadarśanapratiyogī tannivartayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:391: sa ca sāmānyena bhedadarśanaṃ pravilāpayannātmanāpi pravilīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:394: tathā ca tasminnapi pravilīne svacchaḥ pariśuddho 'syātmā prakāśate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:395_1: saṃharatsvayamapi saṃhriyamāṇaṃ svacchāṃ svarūpāvasthāmupanayati, evameva śravaṇādibhirbhedadarśane
GSP33mbrahsiu:396: viśeṣābhāvāttadgate ca bhede, svacche pariśuddhe svarūpe jīvo 'vatiṣṭhate
GSP33mbrahsiu:397: avidyayaiva tu brahmaṇo jīvo vibhaktaḥ, tannivṛttau brahmasvarūpameva bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:398: yathā ghaṭādibhede tadākāśaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paramākāśameva bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:400: kathaṃ bhedenaiva bhedaḥ pratisaṃhriyate? bhedapratipakṣatvāt, yathā rajasā rajaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:403: yathā payaḥ payo jarayati [KKS_13] svayaṃ ca jīryati, yathā ca viṣaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:411: sādhyā tarhi, tathā ca kṛtakatvādanityatvam, ata āha ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:426: ‘tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:433: tatrāvidyayaiva vidyāpratyāsannayā vibhāgadarśanamavidyāṃ tīrtvā vidyālakṣaṇe nitye svarūpe 'vatiṣṭhate, pratibimbakaluṣitamivodakaṃ tannivṛttau /
GSP33mbrahsiu:435: aikātmye vibhāgasyāsatyatvāt, tadadhiṣṭhānaśravaṇādayo 'pyasatyāḥ kathaṃ kasmaicitkāryāya syuḥ? asatyācca satyapratipattirmithyaiva, yathā dhūma iti mithyāgṛhītādbāṣpāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:439: bhavati hi māyā prīterbhayasya ca nimittam, asatyaṃ ca [KKS_14]
GSP33mbrahsiu:448: api ca abhedadarśanopāyā api na svarūpeṇa mithyā, yato brahmaivaiṣāṃ svarūpam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:452: na rekhāgavayo gavayatvena gavayāntarāṇāṃ pratipattihetuḥ, na rekhā varṇatvena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:454: etatsadṛśo gavaya iti, rekhā ca samayāt ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:455: īdṛśīṃ rekhāṃ dṛṣṭvāyaṃ varṇaḥ smartavya iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:458: bālā hi rekhāsu varṇatvenaiva vyutpādyante loke 'bhedena ca vyapadeśaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:464: tataśca maraṇamūrcchādyanumānaṃ na vitatham, kālādi bhedayuktātsatyāhidaṃśādiva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:465: yasyaiva kṣaṇikajñānamātmā tasyaiva tūpaneyāpaneyāsambhavānmokṣaśostrāṇāṃ muktyarthānāṃ ca pravṛttīnāṃ vaiyarthyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:473: nātyantamasatī santatiḥ, nāpi satī, kalpanayā tu satī, tadvimokṣāya śāstrāṇi pravṛttayaśceti
GSP33mbrahsiu:478: api cābhyupagamyāpi kṣaṇikaṃ vijñānamanādinidhanāyā eva santatermuktisaṃsārāvabhyupetau /
GSP33mbrahsiu:482: sa hyantyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kiñcitkāryamārabheta vā, na vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:486: tadabhāve santāna eva nāsti, kasyocchedaḥ? athārabhata eva kāryamantyaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:487: santānāntare sārvajñe, sati hetuphalabhāve kathaṃ santānāntaram? na hetuphalabhāvādanyadekasantatervyavasthāpakam
GSP33mbrahsiu:489: na ca sārvajñasya jñānasya caramakṣaṇa upādānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:496: vilakṣaṇakārye santatyuccheda iti, tasya rūpajñānaprabandhe viṣayāntaravijñānānnirvāṇaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:500: sā hi tasyāvasthā dehendriyādyupādhibhirakṛtāvacchedā bṛhatī brahmeti gīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:501: jñānasvabhāvatve ca sarvagatasya dehendriyanirapekṣasya nityatvājjñānasvarūpasya sannihitavividhajñeyabhedasya bṛhattaraḥ saṃsāraḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:502: atha na vijānāti kiñcit, na tarhi jñānasvarūpaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:503: sakarmako hi jānātyartho nāsati karmasambandhe yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:509: yathā dāhako 'pi vahnirupanītaṃ dāhyaṃ dahati, nānupanītamadāhyaṃ ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:510: yathā ca sphaṭikadarpaṇādayaḥ [KKS_16] svacchāḥ prakāśasvabhāvā api
GSP33mbrahsiu:511: yadevopanidhīyate yogyaṃ ca tacchāyāpattyā tadeva darśayanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:512: evamayaṃ puruṣo bhogāyatanaśarīrastho bhogasādhanendriyopanītān śabdādīn bhuṅkte, tacchāyāpattyā nityacaitanyo 'pi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:518: yasyāpyajñasyātmano jñānaṃ manaḥsaṃyogādijanyam, tasyāpi sarvamanobhiḥ sarvātmanāṃ saṃyogātkathamupabhogavyavasthā? manaḥsaṃyogamukhena sarve hi
GSP33mbrahsiu:520: athāsya karmanibandhanatvādupabhogasya karmanimittā vyavasthā, sā citirūpātmavādino 'pi na daṇḍavāritā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:521: api cāsyābhedadarśanapariniṣpattyā sarvasminnātmabhāvamāpanne dṛśyābhāvādeva na darśanaṃ dṛksvabhāvasyāpi dagdhuriva vahnerdāhyābhāvānna
GSP33mbrahsiu:525: na tu tad dvitīyamasti tato 'nyadvibhaktam, yatpaśyet'; ‘yatra tvasya
GSP33mbrahsiu:529: kaśca sarvataḥ preyasa ātmano 'bhāvamabhikāṅkṣedityapuruṣārtho mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:536: yasya tu nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgā paramānandasaṃvedanāvasthā tasyaivaikāntikaṃ puruṣārthatvamityalamatiprasaṅgena

GSP33mbrahsiu:556: yatrāpi ‘etenaiva paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyāyīta'; iti śravaṇam, tadapi sarvātmabhāvapratipādanapūrvakam

GSP33mbrahsiu:646: yadi tarhyavidyākrīḍitameva prapañcaḥ, prapañcaśūnyatā tarhi paramārthaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:654: sarvaṃ tu brahmātmakam, brahmarūpeṇa rūpavat, na tu śūnyameva,
GSP33mbrahsiu:657: yadi grahaṇābhāvo 'vidyā, kathaṃ tarhi tannibandhanaḥ saṃsāraḥ? muktāvapi tasya tulyatvāt, tadvadeva na kiñcitprakāśeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:659: ‘tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam'; iti śruteḥ, ‘ātmaivedaṃ sarvam'; iti ca sarvasminnātmopadeśāt, ‘kathamasataḥ sajjāyeta'; iti ca svayaṃ śūnyatāyā niṣedhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:661: śūnye tu kvādhyāsaḥ, kiṃ prakāśatāmiti nirbījataiva syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:662: ‘vijñānamānandam'; iti rūpopadeśācca na sarvābhāvamātraṃ brahma, api tu sarvasyātmeti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:664: na hi kaścijjantuḥ sukhyevopalabhyate, duḥkhyeva vā /

GSP33mbrahsiu:689: 'nantatvātkarmaṇāmaniyatavipākakālatvācca pratisargāvasthāyā iva muktyavasthāyā api pratyudāvṛttibhayaṃ na vyāvartate /

GSP33mbrahsiu:931: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavatyatra brahma samaśnute'; // iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:934: yato na kāmaprāptyā kāmapravilayaḥ, api tu doṣaparibhāvanābhuvā
GSP33mbrahsiu:936: kalayāpi cetkāmairmanaḥ saṃspṛśyate hriyata eva hāribhiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:938: ‘na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānāmupabhogena śāmyati', ‘bhogābhyāsamanu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni cendriyāṇām'; iti ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:951: athānyaparādapyarthādevamavasīyata iti, tadapi hastini dṛṣṭe tatpadena tasyānumānamiva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:952: sākṣāddhi ‘asthūlam'ityupakramya dehendriyavilayo darśitaḥ, arthācca kāmādigrantheḥ kāṭhinyaṃ vaidikaṃ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:957: [KKS_31] ye 'pi viparyayeṇa jñānakarmaṇorekādhikāratvamāhuḥ, tairapi jñānasya karmasambandhe pramāṇaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:959: tatra hi prakaraṇātprakṛtakarmāpūrvalakṣaṇāparo brīhiśabdaḥ svasvarūpa ānarthakyātprakṛtāpūrvasambandhaṃ bodhayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:966: tathā cājñāte pārārthye yā nāma phalaśrutirna sārthavādinī bhavatīti pṛthagadhikāratvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:982: yastu karmaṇāṃ kartā bhoktā ca, sa eva sarvapratyakṣasiddhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:988: tasyaiva tu jīvasyaivamavidyānubandhaṃ pratyakṣāvaseyaṃ rūpam, tacca karmapravṛttihetuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:992: tajjñānasya kathaṃ karmapravṛttirdṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ syāt? tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:993: brahmānandamekamadvayamātmānaṃ vijānataḥ kimarthaṃ kathaṃ vā pravṛttiḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:995: aupaniṣadapuruṣajñānameva karmāṅgatvena coditam ‘yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā [KKS_32] tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:998: ‘taṃ vidyākarmaṇī samanvārabhete'; iti ca vidyākarmaṇoḥ sāhityaṃ darśitam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1005: advaitaviṣayaṃ jñānam'iti manyante, teṣāmanutpāda evādvaitajñānasya prasajyate, pramāṇādivibhāgādvaitapratipattyorvirodhāt
GSP33mbrahsiu:1008: na ca virodho 'nupāyatvaṃ vā, upāyasya pūrvakālatvāt, tadā ca tasyāpralīnatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1016: na ca jñānasahakārīṇi karmāṇi, jñānasya sādhyāntarābhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1018: atha bandhahetuvicchedaḥ sādhya iti tasmin vicchinne tadabhāvānmucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1019: kaḥ punarbandhahetuḥ? anādyavidyā, na tarhi pṛthaktadvicchedaḥ sādhyaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1033: ato viparyayajñānasya nivṛttirvidyayā sādhyeti tatra jñānasya sahakāryapekṣā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1035: na khalu śuktikādiṣu viparyāsapurassaraṃ samupajātasamyagjñānāstannivṛttaye pṛthak prayatante, sahakāri vānyadapekṣante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1036: yato virodhibhāvāntarotpāda eva pūrvapradhvaṃsaḥ, na śūnyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1043: tacca pramṛṣṭāśeṣaviśeṣaviśuddhajñānodaye kutaḥ sambhavaḥ? tathā ca viparyāsasaṃśayābhyāṃ tulyavatprasaṃkhyātāni karmāṇi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1045: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare'; // iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1051: tasya hi brahma gocaraḥ, na śābdasya vibhaktapadārthasaṃsargodgrāhiṇaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1053: kaḥ punarasya viśeṣaḥ, yena tadarthyate? spaṣṭābhatvam, na tasyopayogaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1054: jñānaṃ hi jñeyābhivyāptaye, śābdajñāne cotpanna āptameva jñeyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1055: pramiteḥ pratyakṣaparatvāttatra ca nairākāṅkṣyāttadarthyata iti cet,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1071: anadhigata eva tarhi śabdena pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1075: yadi tarhi na śabdenādhigataṃ brahma, kathaṃ tasminnupāsanā pravartatām?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1090: tathā ‘aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1102: abhyāso hi saṃskāraṃ draḍhayan pūrvasaṃskāraṃ pratibadhya svakāryaṃ santanoti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1111: jāte 'pi tattvadarśane, anāhite ca paṭau saṃskāre, draḍhiyasi ca mithyādarśanaje saṃskāre niścayā api mithyārthā bhavanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1113: tathā pramitarajjubhāvāyā api rajjvāḥ pramāṇānanusandhāne sarpabhrāntyā bhayadarśanam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1127: niścite 'pi guḍasya mādhurye tatra mithyātiktāvabhāso 'vitatha iva
GSP33mbrahsiu:1138: ‘tassyāśramavikalpameke'; ‘yamicchettamavased'; iti, ‘yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajed'; iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1139: ‘etaddha sma vai tatpūrve vidvāṃso 'gnihotraṃ na juhavāñcakrire'; tathā ‘kiṃ prajayā
GSP33mbrahsiu:1140: kariṣyāmaḥ'; tathā ‘kimarthā vayamadhyeṣyāmahe kimarthā vayaṃ yakṣyāmahe';
GSP33mbrahsiu:1142: pratipannagārhasthyasyātmavidyayaiva kṛtakṛtyatāṃ manvānasya ṛṇāpākaraṇaṃ pratyanādṛtasya vihitākaraṇanimittasya pāpmano vidyodayapratibandhṛtvaṃ darśayati ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1146: vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena'; iti vidyāṅgabhāvaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1154: tatra dṛṣṭaivetikartavyatāpekṣyatāṃ śamadamādisādhanaviśeṣaścittavikṣepasya vihantrī, samahitacittasyābhasato jñānaprasādotpatteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1157: tathā cordhvaretasāṃ cāśramiṇāṃ vināpi tairviśuddhavidyodaya iṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1159: sādhanaviśeṣāddhi sā kṣipraṃ kṣiprataraṃ ca vyajyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1171: na hi sphaṭikamaṇeḥ pūrvarūpaṃ vinaṣṭamupadhānasannidheḥ, tadapagame vānyadutpannam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1193: ‘sa eva mahānaja ātmā sattālakṣaṇaḥ'; tathā ‘sattaiva sarvabhedayoniḥ prakṛtiḥ parā'; iti
GSP33mbrahsiu:1199: viśeṣāṇāmabhāve keṣāṃ tatsāmanyam? sāmanyaṃ tūktaṃ brahmavādibhirviśeṣapratyastamukhena nirūpaṇādupacārataḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1200: athābhāva eva sādhyaḥ, viśeṣairevāsya nirviśeṣairvyabhicāra iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1202: -- edition; Originally Brahma- and Tarka-kāṇḍas were together; Vacaspati does not know this
GSP33mbrahsiu:1204: nanu pratyakṣādibhirvyāvṛttānāṃ bhāvasvabhāvānāmavagamānnaikasminnadvaye śabdaḥ pramāṇam, pratyakṣādivirodhāt, grāvaplavanādyarthavacovat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1210: kasmādapramāṇatvam? āmnāyavirodhādeva tu pratyakṣādīni pramāṇatāyāḥ kimiti na cyavante? tulye 'napekṣatve na viśeṣaheturasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1215: tathā ca teṣāṃ prāmāṇyamanumantavyam, tadapabādhane svarūpasyaiva tāvadasiddheḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1225: karmavidhayo hi bhedāśrayā abhedāśrayāśca vedāntāḥ parasparaparāhatā asatyapi pramāṇāntaravirodhe durlabhaprāmāṇyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1252: śakyo hyāmnāyādevānādiravidyāsaṃskāro vibhramahetuḥ pratyakṣādiṣu saṃbhāvayituṃ niścetuṃ ca dehātmābhimāna iva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1255: pratyakṣādīnāṃ tu vyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyam, avidyāsaṃskārsya sthemnā vyavahāraviparyayābhāvāt
GSP33mbrahsiu:1256: yatra ca vyavahāraviparyayo na tatra prāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1257: śabde tu saṃbhāvitadoṣe na tattvāvedanena prāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1260: pratyakṣādīnāṃ tu vyavahāre saṃvādānna śakyate vyavahāravisaṃvādijñānaheturdoṣaḥ kalpayitum
GSP33mbrahsiu:1263: tato doṣānubandhaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1268: tasmācchabdasya prāmāṇyābhyupagame pramāṇāntaravirodhe 'pi tasyaiva balavattvamiti sāṃpratam
GSP33mbrahsiu:1270: na pramitāvapekṣāvattā śabdasya pratyakṣādiṣu, kiṃ tu svarūpasiddhau /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1279: dṛṣṭaṃ ca hetutvenāpekṣitāyā api pūrvasyāḥ pratipatteḥ parasyāḥ pratipatterbalīyastvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1290: tatrābhedaḥ samākṣiptabheda eva pratāyata iti vyāghātaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1299: athaupacārikatvamekatvaṃ tadartho 'vivakṣitārthatā vā japopayoginām, tatra virodha eva nāstīti balābalacintā nāvatarati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1300: tatkutaḥ sāvakāśatvena daurbalyam? kathaṃ ca mukhyamarthamatilaṅghyopacarito 'vakāśaḥ? kathaṃ vautpattike śabdasyārthaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:1304: na pramāṇasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ prāmāṇyam, yena tadvirodhe svarasaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:1307: nirapekṣasya kaḥ pramāṇāntarānusaraṇe [KKS_42] hetuḥ? laukikāstu śabdāḥ pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ svārthamabhidadhatīti yuktā teṣāṃ tadanusāriṇī vṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1308: tulye tvanapekṣatve kimiti na viparyayaḥ, ubhayorvā vyāghātādaprāmāṇyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1309: ‘paurvāparye pūrvadaurbalyam'iti vā rajatajñānasyeva pūrvasya bādhaḥ? na khalu rajatajñānavirodhācchuktijñānamanyaviṣayamaviṣayaṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1311: yatra śrautairarthaiḥ pramāṇārthaniṣpatterasambhavaḥ, tatra dvitīyasyā api
GSP33mbrahsiu:1313: yatra tu śabdāḥ svarasena labhante viṣayam, tatra na pramāṇāntaravirodhādapāvartante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1322: pramāṇe tu svarasasiddhaṃ parityajya kalpanāyāṃ na nibandhanamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1327: yadi matam, na pramāṇasya pramāṇāntarādanugrāhyatvam, api tu svata eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1332: apramāṇikā cārthavyavasthā, tataḥ svarasenāpratīteḥ, anyasya cābhāvāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1336: svarasalabhye tvarthe pratītita eva prāmāṇyamiti netaretarāśrayatā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1337: tasmādvirodhe bādha eva pūrvasya pramāṇānusārī, tathā pratīteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1339: na khalu rajatajñānānugrahāya śuktiśakalajñānasya gocaro 'paraḥ kalpyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1341: yā khalu rajatādivibhramāṇāṃ gatiḥ, sā teṣāmapi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1342: yadi teṣāmupacaritaḥ kalpito vā viṣayaḥ, pratyakṣādīnāmapi tathā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1347: tasmātpratyakṣādivirodhe vedāntānāṃ tathābhāva iti, pratyakṣādiṣvapi tathā darśanāditi
GSP33mbrahsiu:1352: na taiḥ saṃbhūyakāritvam, nāmnāyasya pratyakṣādīnāṃ caikavākyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1358: yatra tvekavākyatayā saṃbhūyakāritvaṃ tatrānupajātavirodhitayā svarasavṛttyā mukhye sthite, prathamayā vṛttyā tadekavākyatvaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:1359: pratipattumaśaknuvanti tadapekṣitārthasamarpaṇānupapatteḥ parapadāni dvitīyayā vṛttyā pūrvāpekṣitamarthaṃ samarpayantyekavākyatāsāmarthyāditi mukhyabalīyastvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1362: te tu siddhaṃ bhedamupāśritya ‘idamanenetthaṃ sādhayet'; iti puruṣahitānuśāsanapradhānāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1365: yathā khalu śyenādiṣu ‘na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni'; iti pratiṣedhātsādhyāṃśapratyastamaye 'pyanuśāsanam, evaṃ sarvatra sarvāṃśapratyastamaye 'pi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1367: niṣiddhānarthodayā kathaṃ hiṃsā sādhyā syāt? atha bhavati kasya
GSP33mbrahsiu:1373: tadevaṃ vyavahārasiddhabhedāśrayeṣu karmavidhiṣu yadyapi bhedapratītirasti [KKS_44], tathāpi teṣāmatatparatvān na tatra prāmāṇyaṃ vṛttānteṣvivārthavādapadānām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1374: tathā ca kutastairvedāntānāṃ parāhatiḥ, vedāntairvā teṣām? api ca pratyakṣādiṣveva parāhatirupalabhyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1378_0: manyate, yo vā nirūḍhanibiḍatayā bhedadarśanāndhakārasya pratyakṣādīnāmeva balavattvaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:1378_1: manyate, lokavacasāṃ ca tairbādhadarśanāt, tatpratibodhanāya virodho nirasyate, na
GSP33mbrahsiu:1378_2: hi yo nāma mandaviṣeṇa vṛścikena daṣṭo mriyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1383: yaugapadyam, vyavacchedapūrvako vidhiḥ, vidhipūrvako vyavaccheda iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1384: tatra vastvantaravyavacchede ubhayasmin vā bhedaḥ pratyakṣagocara iti bhavati virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1385: svarūpavidhimātre tu kasyacidvyavacchedena śūnye na bhedaḥ pramāṇārthaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1387: vidhimātravyāpāraṃ ca pratyakṣam, ato na virodhaḥ kathamityucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1390: na tāvadvyavacchedamātraṃ pratyakṣavyāpāraḥ, na yugapadubhayam, na vyavacchedapūrvakaṃ vidhānam, yataḥ siddhe viṣaye siddharūpameva niṣidhyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1391: ‘nedam iha'; ‘nāyamayam'iti siddhe bhūtale siddho ghaṭaḥ, gavi vā aśvaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1393: kathaṃ tarhyatyantāsatāṃ pradhānakhapuṣpādīnāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ? na hi tatra
GSP33mbrahsiu:1394: kvaciddeśe kāle vā niṣedhaḥ, ātyantikatvāt, nāpi kutaścitsiddhi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1397: khapuṣpādiṣu tāvatsiddheṣu khādiṣu tadvidhāḥ puṣpādayo niṣidhyante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1400: kutaścinnimittād buddhau labdharūpāṇāṃ bahirniṣedhaḥ kriyata iti
GSP33mbrahsiu:1401: varṇayanti, anyathā daivaniṣiddhe kaḥ pratiṣedho 'prāptarūpe? prāptarūpe vā kathamatyantāya pratiṣedhaḥ? api cānapekṣitaviṣayaniṣedhye vyavacchede
GSP33mbrahsiu:1402: śūnyatā pramāṇārthaḥ syāt, na bhedaḥ, sarvasya sarvatrāviśeṣeṇa niṣedhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1403: yastu bhedāya vyavacchedaḥ sa bhedyayoḥ siddhimapekṣate, na ca sā
GSP33mbrahsiu:1404: vidhānādṛta iti prāgvidhānameṣitavyam, vidhipūrvaka eva ca niṣedho
GSP33mbrahsiu:1408: na saṃnihitajaṃ tacca tadanyāmarśi jāyate // MBs_1.6 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1409: na khalvekapramāṇajñānavyāpārau santau vidhivyavacchedau kramavantau yujyete, kṣaṇikatvāt, kramavatorhi vyāpārayoḥ paścāttano na tadvyāpāraḥ syāt, vyavadhānāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1414_1: anavabhāsamāne hi tatra vyavacchedye vyavacchedamātraṃ syāt, na vyavacchedaḥ kasyacit,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1415: tasmānnānavabhāsamāne vyavacchedye vyavacchedaḥ, na ca saṃnihitārthāvalambane pratyakṣe 'saṃnihitāvabhāso yuktaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1416: kathamidānīṃ bādhakaṃ pratyakṣam? tatra hi pūrvārthaniṣedhapuraḥsaro
GSP33mbrahsiu:1418: niyamaḥ, yataḥ pūrvo niṣedhaḥ, ekajñānavyāpāre ca kramaḥ, pratyakṣeṇa cāsaṃnihitārthāvabhāsaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:1419_0: naitatsāram, tatrāpi pūrvavijñānavihite rajatādau ‘idam'; iti ca saṃnihitārthasāmānye
GSP33mbrahsiu:1419_1: niṣedho vidhipūrva eva, śuktikāvidhistu virodhiniṣedhapūrva ucyate, vidhipūrvatā
GSP33mbrahsiu:1419_2: ca niyamena niṣedhasyocyate, na vidherniṣedhapūrvakatā niṣidhyate, na ca tatraikajñānasya
GSP33mbrahsiu:1424: pūrvāpekṣayaiva ca tad dvirūpamudeti, anyathā ekarūpamevodīyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1425: api ca sarvavyavacchedānapākurvataḥ ko vyavacchedo 'bhimataḥ, yena
GSP33mbrahsiu:1426: pratyavasthīyeta? siddhaḥ sa loka iti cet, ayaṃ vā kiṃ na lokasiddhaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1431: darśanaṃ yathaiva tadākāratayā tadrūpaṃ vidadhāti, tathā
GSP33mbrahsiu:1433: tatsāmarthyaprabhāvitau ca ‘idam, nedam'iti vikalpau bhāvābhāvavyavahāraṃ pravartayataḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:1437: mā sma bhūdaviśeṣeṇa mā na bhūdekadhījuṣām // MBs_1.7 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1444: yāvanto 'syānātmānastānaviśeṣeṇa tadātmaniyamāddarśanamapākaroti, tathā ca nāsyānya ātmānaḥ, taddeśakālāstu bhaveyuḥ, rūpādivadavirodhāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1448: satyamastyayaṃ vibhāgaḥ, na tvidānīṃ darśanapratiniyamasya sāmarthyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1450_0: pratiniyatamapi tatra deśe kāle ca rūpe darśanaṃ tayoryathā rūpavidhimātropakṣayānna
GSP33mbrahsiu:1450_2: ghaṭadṛśyamapi vyavacchindyāt, vyavacchede vā sarvasya vyavacchedaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1455: naikasya bahava ātmāna iti cet, anyatastarhi virodhādvyavacchedaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1457: asati ca vyavacchede kuto bahutvam, kuto vā virodha itaretarāśrayaṃ vā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1459: api ca ekaniyamādanyavyavacchede citrādiṣu nīlādīnāmekadarśanabhājāṃ bhedo na sidhyet, ekajñānasaṃsargādekatra jñānasyāniyamāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1460: nanu prakṛtyaiva bhinnā bhāvāḥ, tāṃstadvidhān vidadhadeva darśanaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:1461: parasparato vyāvartayati, na hi vyāvṛttiranyā vyāvṛttimataḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1462: tatra vyāvṛttimadvidhau sāpi vidhīyata eva, yatprakṛtiḥ khalu yaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:1463: padārthaḥ sa tayaiva prakṛtyā vidheyaḥ, anyathā na tasya vidhiḥ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1467: api ca na bhedo vastuno rūpaṃ tadabhāvaprasaṅgataḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1468: arūpeṇa ca bhinnatvaṃ vastuno nāvakalpate // MBs_1.8 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1471: tathā ca tasyā ekasyā anekavṛttervastusvabhāvatve vastūnāmapi bhedo na syāt, naikasmādabhinnasvabhāvaṃ bhinnaṃ yujyate tadvadeva /

GSP33mbrahsiu:2580: tathā sattāguṇatvadravyeṣvanekendriyagrāhyeṣvindriyāntarāṇāmindriyāntarasāpekṣatvaprasaṅgaḥ atha śabdasyaiva pramāṇāntarasaṃbhave sāpekṣatvam, viśeṣaheturvācyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2582: yadi śabdamātradharmo 'yamasaṃbhavādeva tadviṣaye pratyakṣāderbuddhādivākyavadaprāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti, saṃbhave tvindriyaviṣaye pratyayitapuruṣavacovadyujyate prāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2586: api ca pratyakṣādhigataviṣayaṃ kiñcidanumānamiti na sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya tathā pratyakṣasāpekṣatā, yathā cāgamapūrvakaṃ ṣaḍjādivivekaviṣayaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:2587: pratyakṣamiti na sarvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tathā, evaṃ puruṣavacasāṃ pramāṇāntarādhigataviṣayatvadarśane 'pi nāpauruṣeyasya tathābhāvo bhūtārthasyāpi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2595: ‘svargakāmaḥ sikatā bhakṣayet'; iti [KKS_82] lokavacāṃsyapi kāryaniṣṭhānyanapekṣāṇi prāmāṇyamaśnuvīran
GSP33mbrahsiu:2596: atha yastatra sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sa puruṣavivakṣāpūrvakaḥ, tena tatra sāpekṣatā, vede tu sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'pi na puruṣavivakṣāpūrvakaḥ ityanapekṣatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2597: yo vā viṣayaniyojyaniyogānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ, sa puruṣabuddhiviracito lokavākye
GSP33mbrahsiu:2605: tadbhāve loke sāpekṣatvāt, tadabhāve vede nirapekṣatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2606: na viṣaye pramāṇāntarasaṃbhavaḥ, tadabhāve 'pi lokaniyoge sāpekṣatvadarśanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2609: loke vede na vyapekṣā talloke ca vyapekṣaṇam // MBs_2.22 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2610: niyogaparyavasitaṃ vaidikaṃ vacaḥ, sa ca pramāṇāntarasyāgocara
GSP33mbrahsiu:2612: sādhyasādhanabhāvaniṣṭhaṃ tu laukikaṃ vacaḥ, sa pramāṇāntaraviṣaya iti
GSP33mbrahsiu:2618: anyatra viniyogaḥ, yathā gośabdasya sāsnādimān, aśvaśabdasya kesarādimān /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2620: loke cedviniyogaḥ śabdārthaḥ, tatraivāsya sāmarthyamadhigatam, na niyoge /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2621: tatra vede 'pi viniyoga eva pramāṇārthaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2641: yadi puruṣo 'dhigate viṣaye vacaḥ prayuṅkte iti viniyogaviṣayatā tasya
GSP33mbrahsiu:2646: vacaḥ prayuṅkte puruṣo nākasmāttena tadgiri // MBs_2.26 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2651: yatropalabdherniścayaḥ ‘saṃbhavatyasyopalabdhiḥ, na cānupalabhyāyaṃ bravīti'; iti tatra prāmāṇyam, yathāptapuruṣasya pramāṇaviṣaye /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2652: yatra tūpalabdherasaṃbhava eva yathā dṛṣṭārthe buddhādivākye, yatra cānupalabhyāpi vacanapravṛttisaṃbhāvanā, tatrāprāmāṇyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2657: [KKS_84] ata eva pauruṣeyatvāpauruṣeyatve sāpekṣatvānapekṣatvakāraṇe nyāyavidbhirdaśite pauruṣeyatvanirākaraṇaprayatnena
GSP33mbrahsiu:2659: autpattike śabdārthasambandhe 'svātantryācchabdasya na puruṣabuddhipūrvakatvamiti na pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnā śabdādarthāvagatiriti nirapekṣatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2666: atha pramāṇāntarasaṃbhave 'pi yadi codanāprāmāṇyaṃ na vyāhanyate, ko
GSP33mbrahsiu:2668: pramāṇāntarasaṃbhave hi sarvajñābhimatabuddhādyupadiṣṭo 'pi dharmaḥ pratīyeta tatra na dharmatattvamavadhāritaṃ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2671: athavā tadvirodhāccodanāyā bādhaḥ syāt, saṃśayo vā tulyabalatve, tena tasyāsaṃbhavaḥ pratipādyate
GSP33mbrahsiu:2676: yataḥ yadarthasya pratipādakam, na tu tadapekṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2688: uktena prakāreṇa na sāpekṣatvamiti ‘bhūtārthamapi sāpekṣaṃ nāto 'puruṣabuddhijam'iti suṣṭhūktam
GSP33mbrahsiu:2689: atha saṃsargabhājo no padārthāḥ kriyayā vinā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2690: kimāyātaṃ vidheḥ sāpi tvastyādiḥ sulabhā kva na // MBs_2.29 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2708: yat pramāṇenāvagamyate tatra ‘asti'; iti vyavahāro laukikānām viparyaye
GSP33mbrahsiu:2717: tathā cāstyarthaniṣṭhaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇāntarāpekṣamevārthaṃ bodhayati pramāṇaviṣayatāyā astyarthatvāt
GSP33mbrahsiu:2722: bhidyetottarakāle vā bhavantī na khalu tridhā // MBs_2.31 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2727: tatra yadi buddhiḥ pramāṇaviṣayatāṃ gocarayati pramite hi syāt na pramāṇādeva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2728: na hi prāk pramāṇotpatteḥ san pramāṇasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2733: tathāpi naiva bhidyeta netthaṃ cānyavyapekṣatā // MBs_2.32 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2739: na traividhyam, sarvasya pramitau pramāṇasaṃbandhasya vartamānatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2742: syālliṅgamapi sāpekṣaṃ tatsiddhestata eva cet // MBs_2.33 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2750: bhūtāyāṃ dṛṣṭau kasyacidbhūtaṃ pratyakṣam, bhaviṣyantyāṃ bhaviṣyat,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2766: yuktaṃ liṅgasya prāmāṇyamevam, arthe tasya pramāṇāntarasya saṃbhavāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2770: tatra yathaiva buddhādivākyānām ‘evamayaṃ puruṣo veda'; iti jñānaniṣṭhānāmatīndriyārthe jñānasyāsaṃbhavānnārthe
GSP33mbrahsiu:2775: api ca meyatvameva sattā cenmāne trividhatā kutaḥ // MBs_2.35 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2777: yadi ca liṅgena pramāṇameva mīyate, mīyamānataiva ca sattā, tatra pramīyamāṇatvātpramāṇaṃ sarvaṃ sadeva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2780: na pramāṇatraividhyādarthe traividhyam, mīyamānasya sattvātsataśca vartamānatvāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2790: yadi vartamānapramāṇayogaḥ sattā tadviparyayo 'sattā, ‘nāsti'; ityeva syāt na ca ‘asti'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2794: pramite ca na jijñāsā punaḥ syātsadasattvayoḥ // MBs_2.38 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2795: anāśritakālaviśeṣe pramāṇayogamātre sattve pramitanaṣṭamapi vastu saditi tenārthakriyāprasaṅge 'naṣṭeneva, sattvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2796: naṣṭānaṣṭayorviśeṣānnaivamiti cet, sa eva tarhi viśeṣaḥ sadasadvyavahāravyavasthāyā hetuḥ kāryavyavasthāyā iva, na pramāṇayogaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2799: kiṃ ca pramite 'rthe sadasattve jijñāseranna punarlaukikāḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2801: atha pramāṇayogyatvaṃ sattā (Mss AB; sattvaṃ -- edition) naṣṭācca taccyutam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2806: sā ca naṣṭāccyuteti na tasya sattvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2807: smaryamāṇe tu kutaściccyutā kutaścinneti na sarvasyāsattvamiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2811: pramāṇayogyo 'rthasvabhāvaḥ sattā, arthasvabhāvanibandhana eva sadasadvyavahāravibhāgaḥ, na pramāṇatadabhāvopādhiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2812: tasya tveṣa kathanopāyaḥ, na pramāṇasaṃsparśaḥ, yathā ‘nīlākārajñānayogyo
GSP33mbrahsiu:2817: bhinnā evārthasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇaṃ prati yogyāḥ sacchabdavācyāḥ santu, naikā sattā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2822: api ca yadi tasyānekatvam, kathamabhinnaśabdapravṛttiḥ? tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2831: yo hi sattāmavajānīte sa dravyatvādīnyapyavajānīta eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2832: na kila tejo dṛṣṭavato 'psu tadavamarśo bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2833: api ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyā api santa eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2845: tatra na sarvārthasaṃgrahaḥ syāt, yathā ‘navavidho gośabdārthaḥ'iti
GSP33mbrahsiu:2850: kiṃ tu pratipadyante pravādinaḥ kañcidarthasvabhāvamekam, yasyāyaṃ ‘pañca,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2853: athaitāvān pramāṇayogyo 'rthakriyāsāmarthyo veti pramāṇayogyatve 'rthakriyāsāmarthye vā saṃgrahaḥ, tābhyāmeva sacchabdārtha upalakṣyatām,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2858: na hi ‘san ghaṭaḥ'; iti nimittabhedeṣu pratipattāraḥ saṃśerate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2859: yathaiva ‘śuklaḥ paṭaḥ'iti nirākāṅkṣaḥ, tathā ‘san ghaṭaḥ'; ityapi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2860: yastu dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma rūpaṃ vijñānamiti vā saṃśayaḥ, na sa laukikānām
GSP33mbrahsiu:2867: yatra tu śabdāt, tatra viśeṣāvagamahetorvinā sākāṅkṣatvameva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2875: na ca niścite viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhidhānānuviddhaḥ saṃśayo bhavati daṇḍābhāvaniścaya iva ‘daṇḍī na vā'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2883: yo 'pyarthakriyayā sacchabdārthaṃ viśinaṣṭi upalakṣayati vā, tasyāpi prākkāryadarśanānna sacchabdayogaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2885: atha vaikalpikīyaṃ pramāṇottarakālateti matam, liṅgānna syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2886: atha nirjñātakāryasaṃbandhameva liṅgenānugamyate, evaṃ tarhi prameyābhāvaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:2897: kāryapramāṇasadasadbhāvanibandhane hi sadasadvyavahāravibhāge tasyāpravṛttireva kāryapramāṇasadasadvyavahāravibhāgasyāpi tannibandhatvaprasaṅgāt, anavasthānāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2898: tasmādarthasvabhāva ekā satteti (@svabhāva ekaḥ satteti -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:2906: bhūmau nikhātamavidyamānendriyasaṃbandhamadṛśyamānāvinābhūtamasaṃvedyamānānyathānavakalpamānaṃ vastu pralīnadraṣṭṛkaṃ yattasya na pratyakṣānumānārthāpattyāgamahetavaḥ santi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2910: tatra pramāṇahetubhāvalakṣaṇayogyatārūpe sattve pramāṇahetvabhāvasya niścayātsaṃśayo na syāt
GSP33mbrahsiu:2911: atha svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ kaścitpramāṇaṃ prati yogyaḥ sattvam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2913: atha vā pramāṇaviśiṣṭaḥ sacchabdārtha ityetadanena nirākriyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2914: na niścite viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhidhāyiśabdānuviddhaḥ saṃśayo yukta iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2918: amitaṃ hi tathā kasmāttathā na punaranyathā // MBs_2.41 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2921: tatra yadi pramāṇasyāviṣayaḥ, yadi [KKS_92] sarvaśaktiviraho vāsadbuddherviṣayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2923: aparicchinnaṃ hi tathā pramāṇena kimiti tadvidham, na punaranyathā syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2924: na cettasya tathābhāve 'tathābhāve vā pramāṇavyāpāraḥ kiṃnimitta
GSP33mbrahsiu:2936: prāgapi ca bhūbhāgaparicchedāt prasajyeta, yasya kasyacidvastvantarasya paricchittervidyamānatvāt
GSP33mbrahsiu:2942: na cāpariccheda eva jijñāsyaḥ, svataḥ siddhatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2956: atha yatra pravṛttiḥ syāttatra kevalasaṃvidaḥ // MBs_2.44 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2957: jijñāseta na sūkṣmārthaṃ kaivalyaṃ saṃvido yadi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2958: kevalo viṣayo neṣṭo rūponmiśre 'pi tadyataḥ // MBs_2.45 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2961: yatra bhūbhāgādau caraṇanyāsādilakṣaṇā pravṛttiḥ, tasya kevalasya sā
GSP33mbrahsiu:2966: yadi vijñānasya, pramite 'pi bhūbhāgādau sthūle sūkṣmakīṭakaṇṭakādibhāvābhāvaparīkṣā na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2969: svarūpeṇa vā viṣayasya kaivalyam, viśeṣaṇayogena vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2970: tatra na tāvatsvarūpeṇa, miśre 'pi tasya bhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2972: yato nānyābhāvādviśeṣaṇamanyādṛśaṃ kiñciddṛśyate, yadviśeṣaṇaṃ vastu kevalaṃ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2974: mānābhāvaṃ yadi kṣuṇṇaṃ meyābhāvasya tatra kim /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2981_0: yadyevaṃ pramāṇābhāvo viṣaya uktaḥ syāt ‘nāsti'; iti dhīśabdayoḥ, tatra ko 'parādhaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:2981_1: syātprameyābhāvasya, yena [KKS_94] tamatilaṅghya pramāṇābhāvo viṣaya ucyate? na hi
GSP33mbrahsiu:2997: yadi khalvadarśane viparyayadarśanabhramo bhavati suṣuptādyavasthāsu viśvābhāvadarśanabhramaḥ syādālokādarśanabhramavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3000: āropasya viṣayaṃ purovarti vastu āropaṇīyaṃ ca rajataṃ jñānenānāpnuvan na rajatabhramavān bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3002: na ca buddhyabhāvo jñānasya viṣayo na vyavahārābhāvaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3006: [KKS_95] astu vā mānayogyatvaṃ sattvaṃ tacca pramīyatām // MBs_2.51 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3019: kathaṃ nānveṣyam? yadā vacaḥ pramāṇayogyatāyāṃ paryavasitaṃ na viśiṣṭārthasattvaṃ bodhayati, tatra yasya pramāṇasya yogyo viśiṣṭo 'rthastadavaśyāpekṣaṇīyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3024: pramāṇāntarabhinnārthamapi mānaṃ na no vacaḥ // MBs_2.53 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3029: na khalu pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnārthamapi vaco na pramāṇam, pramāṇameva hyāptavākyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3030: kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇaṃ sāpekṣamiti cet, ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3032: kevale hyarthe ‘evamayamarthaḥ'ityapratīteḥ ‘evamayaṃ puruṣo veda'iti ca pratīteḥ puruṣajñānāpekṣam
GSP33mbrahsiu:3034: kathaṃ tarhi puruṣavacaḥ kiñcidabādhitārthamapi sāpekṣatvenāpramāṇaṃ kathyate? ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3035: yadyapyarthe bādho nāsti, yadapekṣaṃ tvasyārthe prāmāṇyaṃ yatsiddhimukhena taṃ sādhayati tatra pramāṇāṃśe bādhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3036: tasyāsiddhestaddvāreṇa nārthasiddhirityarthe 'pramāṇam, yathātīndriyārthe buddhavacaḥ puruṣasya darśanāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3043: āptavacaḥ punarnārthe nāpi pramāṇāṃśe saṃbhavatpramāṇagocaraṃ bādhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3044: pramāṇāṃśe cānapekṣaṃ tanmukhena cārthasiddhiṃ vidadhannāpramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3050: evaṃ ca pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnārthatve 'pi vedāntavacasāṃ na prāmāṇyavyāhatiḥ, āptavākyavat
GSP33mbrahsiu:3052: tānyapi jñānajñeyavibhāgavikalaṃ svaprakāśarūpamalaukikaṃ kāmamavagamayantu pramāṇāntaram, taddvārā cārthasiddhirāptavacanavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3056: evaṃ na meyatā sattā paraḥ punaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3058: [KKS_97] na hi pūrvāvamarśena vinā sāmānyakalpanā // MBs_2.59 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3060: avamarśo dṛṣṭasatastathā na hi sadantare // MBs_2.60 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3069: ko nu pūrvāvamarśo 'yaṃ pūrvarūpānvayo dhiyaḥ // MBs_2.61 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3071: sarvātmanā tvanugamo na dṛṣṭaḥ khaṇḍamuṇḍayoḥ // MBs_2.62 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3075: na dṛṣṭamallakasyāsti maṇike khalu tādṛśaḥ // MBs_2.64 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3078: tatra yadi pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ, so 'styeva sadantare mātrayā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3086: na viśeṣamātreṇa saṃvedyānvayirūpapratyākhyānaṃ yujyate, gotvāderapi tatsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3087: na hi devadattasya dvitīyadarśane yādṛśo rūpānugamaḥ, [KKS_98] tādṛśaḥ khaṇḍaṃ dṛṣṭavato muṇḍadarśane
GSP33mbrahsiu:3090: na ca tāvatā mṛjjātihīnatā tayoḥ, kiñcittulyatayāvabhāsamānatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3092: pūrvāvamarśaḥ sa iti prakhyetyapi na śobhate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3093: maṇikaṃ vīkṣitavataḥ so 'pi nodeti mallake // MBs_2.65 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3094: pūrvāparānusandhānātmikā ‘so 'yam'ityabhedamavagamayantī bhinneṣvapi sāmānyakalpanāheturbuddhiḥ pūrvāvamarśa ityucyata ityetadapi na śobhate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3099: api ca dṛṣṭamaṇikasya mallake na bhavati drāgiva ‘saḥ'ityanusandhānaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:3103: tulye tarhi sāmānyayoge kasmātkvacit ‘saḥ'ityavamarśaḥ nānyatra? ucyate
GSP33mbrahsiu:3115: na ca viśiṣṭabuddheḥ prāk (sadbuddheḥ prāk --edition) pramāṇagrahaṇaṃ tatkālaṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3119: yadi tarhi na pramāṇayogo 'styarthaḥ, kathaṃ tatkālānuvidhāyinī kālapravṛttirastyarthe
GSP33mbrahsiu:3122: na ca ‘kriyāmantareṇa na saṃsargaḥ padārthānām'; iti śabdārthanayavidāmavigānamityāha ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3125: ‘rājño 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ'phalitā ete vanaspatayaḥ'iti kriyārahiteṣvapi saṃsargaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3127: yato na nirjñātarājasaṃbandhasya puruṣasya phalavatāṃ ca vanaspatīnāṃ satteha pratipādyā gamyate
GSP33mbrahsiu:3129: kiṃ tu puruṣasya rājasaṃbandhe, drumāṇā ca phalasaṃbandhe ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3130: ‘yo 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ, sa rājñaḥ'; ‘ya ete vanaspatayaḥ, te phalitāḥ', na ‘yo
GSP33mbrahsiu:3131: rājapuruṣaḥ, so 'sti'; ‘ye ca phalitāḥ te santi'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3133: ‘avadhāryatām'; iti pratipattikriyāvidhinā kriyāvattāṃ manyate, tadapi śabdādeva pratipatteḥ siddhatvātprāṅ nirastameveti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3134: athāpi na kriyārahitaṃ vākyamasti kriyāyāṃ ca sāpekṣatā, tathāpi na doṣa
GSP33mbrahsiu:3141: tathā ca śrutayaḥ kāścidevameva brahma pratipādayanti ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3142: ‘sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante'; ‘yathāgneḥ kṣudrā viṣphuliṅgā vyuccaranti evamevāsmādātmanaḥ sarve devāḥ'; ityādi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3143: tathā yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhṇate ca yathā pṛthivyāmoṣadhayaḥ saṃbhavanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3147: tathākṣarādvividhāḥ somya bhāvāḥ prajāyante tatra caivāpiyanti'; //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3152: khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇi'; // iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3176: anadhigataṃ hi śroturarthaṃ bodhayituṃ vacaḥ prayujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3180: tathā bhāvārtho niyogaviṣayaḥ, na dravyaguṇaśabdārtha iti
GSP33mbrahsiu:3183: tasmādvivakṣāviśeṣasiddhirnāsaṃsṛṣṭeṣu padārtheṣu bhavatīti tathā vivakṣayā prayuktāḥ saṃsṛjyante
GSP33mbrahsiu:3187: yato na tattasya pratipādakam, [KKS_102] na prayojakaṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3201: atha pramāṇāntareṇopalabhyārthaṃ vivakṣitvā parasmai pratipādayati puruṣaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:3213: apūrvo 'pi hi śrotuḥ saṃsargo vaktuḥ pramāṇānumānamukhena satyatāṃ labhate tadasaṃbhave 'satyatvādbuddhādivākyeṣu
GSP33mbrahsiu:3220: kathaṃ nu vidhyadhīnatvaṃ yadi syādanyathā vṛthā // MBs_2.73 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3224: vidhirnaivaṃ kasya hetoratha syādaparaṃ padam // MBs_2.75 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3230: na tāvadvidhiḥ sākṣātsaṃsargasāmānyaṃ tadviśeṣaṃ vā bodhayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3234: na ca loke padaiḥ svārthāḥ svarūpamātraniṣṭhatayaiva pratyyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3246: yadicānyapadārthānāmānarthakyam, vidhyarthasya tanna kasmāt? Atha matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3261: [KKS_104] śabdādeva mite yo 'pi manyate saṃgatigraham // MBs_2.78 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3262: nānyonyasaṃśrayāvadyaṃ na svayaṃ pramite hi saḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3263: pareṇa śabdāvagate tatpravṛttyā ca sūcite // MBs_2.79 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3272: tadavagamācca tasya vṛddhasya yā pravṛttistayānumite ‘nūnamanena vṛddhena pratipannaḥ kaścitpravṛttiheturartho
GSP33mbrahsiu:3290: na khalu bījāṅkurayorivānayorekasya prāthamyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3292: api ca sarvapratipattṝṇāmanumānapūrvā śabdātpratipattiriti teṣāṃ śabdo
GSP33mbrahsiu:3295: śabdādbuddhyamāno 'numitaṃ viditasaṃgatiṃ budhyate sarvapratipattā, na tvanumimānaḥ śabdāvagatamanumimīte
GSP33mbrahsiu:3300: na cālaukikaḥ kalpayitumapi śakyaḥ, laukikādapi pravṛttisiddheḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3305: tatra laukikīṣu pravṛttiṣu laukike viditasaṃbandhe vede 'pi
GSP33mbrahsiu:3309: tatra vede laukikānāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmasaṃbhavādalaukikaṃ viśeṣāntaraṃ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3310: evamapi yaḥ śabdārtho vede sāmānyaṃ sa lokasiddha iti nānuvādatā vyāvartate padārthāntaravat
GSP33mbrahsiu:3311: yo 'pi viśeṣaḥ so 'nyāsaṃbhavena pariśeṣānumānagocara iti na
GSP33mbrahsiu:3316: tatra vaidikīṣu pravṛttiṣu laukikapravṛttihetvabhāvādalaukike [KKS_106] tu pravṛttihetau vaidikānāṃ vidhāyakānāṃ saṃbandhajñānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3320: na ca laukikasyaiva śreyaḥsādhanatvasya saṃbhava iti yuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3322: tatra prayogadarśanālliṅādestadanusāreṇa ca śabdārthāvadhāraṇāt pramāṇāntaragamyatāpi śabdārthānupraveśinī
GSP33mbrahsiu:3324: bhavatu nāma vedavyavahārādeva śabdārthānugamaḥ, tathāpi na pramāṇāntaragocaratā vyāvartate
GSP33mbrahsiu:3326: alaukike pravṛttihetau śabdasya sāmarthyajñānakāle pramito vā syāt, na vā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3329: atha na pramitaḥ, kathaṃ tatra saṃbandhajñānam? na hyapramitayoḥ saṃbandhinostadāśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pramātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3337: kiṃ pratyayamātre sāmarthyaṃ gṛhyate, atha viśiṣṭe pravṛttihetupratyaye?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3339: atha viśiṣṭe laukikavyatiriktapravṛttihetupratyaye, pravṛttipariśeṣābhyāṃ tasyānumitatvātprāptaṃ pramāṇāntaragocaratvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3355: tathā na viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ hi tatra yathārthatve tathābhūtagrāhiṇī tatpratītirarthaśūnyā syāt? pariśeṣātpramāṇam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3356: parajñānena ca paraḥ pratipadyata iti subhāṣitam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3358: na parajñānena paraḥ pratipadyate, kiṃ tu svajñānenaiva
GSP33mbrahsiu:3360: atha tasya svajñānaṃ katamatpramāṇamiti vācyam, na tāvacchābdam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3374: na ca vaktṛjñānenaivārthasiddhiḥ, parajñānena na paraḥ pratipadyata ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3379: anyathā pramāṇāntaraparatantraṃ puruṣavaco 'rthe sāpekṣamityetadeva na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3380: na hi yo yasyāviṣayaḥ sa tatra sāpekṣo 'napekṣo vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3383: tacca vaktṛdhīhetusaṃbhavādvākyasya, na tu vaktṛdhiya eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3384: śabdasya cārthena saṃbandhaḥ, na tu jñānena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3392: na ca pratītimātre, arthavatyāḥ pratīteḥ smṛtipramāṇayoranyataratrāntargamāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3393: ānarthakye kena saṃbandha? yadi ca śābdapratītivyatirekiṇyāpi pratītyā sa viṣayīkriyate 'pramāṇātmikayāpi, bhavatyayamaśābdasyāpi jñānasya gocara
GSP33mbrahsiu:3394: iti pramāṇāntarāśaṅkā kena vāryate? naca pramāṇāntarāvagamyatā śabdārthamanupraviśati, yato nānvayamātreṇa vyatirekamātreṇa vā śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3395: sati hyanyasmin prayojake 'rthe yasyābhāve na prayogaḥ so 'pi tasya śabdasya prayojaka iti gamyate, yathā satsu hetvantareṣu yasyābhāve na kāryaṃ so 'pi heturgamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3396: iha ca śreyohetuvivakṣāyāṃ liṅgāderdarśanāt, tadabhāve satyapi pramāṇāntaragamyatve 'darśanācchreyohetutvaṃ tāvacchabdārthaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3397: pramāṇāntaragamyatve yadyapi darśanam, tadabhāve ca yadyapyadarśanam, na tu śreyohetutve sati pramāṇāntaragamyatāyā abhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3400: tatra śreyaḥsādhanatāyāḥ prayojakatvasyāvadhāritatvāt [KKS_109] tadabhāve tannibandhana iti gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3402: anyathā śiṃśapāśabdārthe sattvādayo 'pyanupraviśeyuḥ, teṣu satsu prayogāttadabhāve cāprayogāt
GSP33mbrahsiu:3403: atha śiṃśapātvasya śabdārthatvāttadabhāvanibandhana eva sattādyabhāve 'prayogaḥ, tatsadbhāvācca prayoga upapadyata iti na teṣu sāmarthyakalpanā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3407: na hi ya ekatra yasya pramāṇasya gocaraḥ so 'nyatrāpi mithyā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3409: tathā yāgādiṣu viprakṛṣṭakālaphaleṣu vedāvagamyaṃ śreyaḥsādhanatvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3413: tadaviṣaye tu śabdārthe na tadvirodha iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3417: atha mā bhūdānantaryacodanā, mā ca bhūtpramāṇāntarāvagamyatā śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3423: kṛṣyauṣadhapānādiṣvanyathāpi darśanāt, avāntarakāryasya yāgādāvapi pramāṇasāmarthyena siddheḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:3424: api ca viśiṣṭasiddhau viśeṣaṇamapi śreyohetutvamātraṃ siddham /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3435: tadāpi pravṛttipramitastadhetupratyayo na tamantareṇetyāptavacanārthavadanumeyatā na vyāvartate
GSP33mbrahsiu:3447: na brūmo vidhiranyathā vṛthā syāditi tadadhīnaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3448: kiṃ tu pramāṇāntmanaiva sa svaśabdena pratipādyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3455: api ca yatrāsya prāmāṇyamiṣyate, śabdasyaiva tatrāstu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3463: kva ca pramāṇameṣo 'rthe na yāgādau svaśabdake // MBs_2.87 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3467: na saṃsargaḥ padārthānāṃ svaśabdaistu prakāśitāḥ // MBs_2.89 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3470: ato na viddhyabhāvena saṃsargo na prakalpate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3475: avidhiṣvapi laukikeṣu vākyeṣu śroturanadhigato 'pūrvaḥ saṃsargaḥ pratīyate ‘brāhmaṇa putraste jātaḥ'ityādiṣu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3478: anupāyatve hi tasya na sa kāminyā kṛtaḥ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3480: na hi śabdasya tatra kaścidaparādhaḥ, yena tamatikramyānyatpramāṇaṃ mṛgyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3484: atha vā śabdastatra na duṣyati phalasādhanasāmarthye, niyogastu duṣyatyeva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3487: tasmāt saṃbandhajñānāpekṣatvena padārthāntaraiḥ samānatvādvidhāyakārthasya na śakyaṃ viśeṣeṇa vaktuṃ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3489: sarva eva tu padārthāḥ saṃbandhayogyaiḥ kārakādibhāvaiḥ svapadebhyaḥ pratītāḥ sannikarṣeṇa saṃsṛjyante, yato lokācchabdavyāpārāvagamaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3490: loke ca [KKS_112] padaiḥ svārthānāṃ pratipādanaṃ sannikarṣeṇa
GSP33mbrahsiu:3493: sarve hi te padairaparyavasitarūpāḥ svarūpamātre prakāśyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3494: evaṃ padārthāntaraistulyatvādvidheḥ na viśeṣeṇa tannibandhanaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3495: sarvapadārthanibandhane ca saṃsarge na vidhyabhāvena saṃsargo nopapadyate
GSP33mbrahsiu:3497: kathaṃ nopāsanīyaḥ, yadā niyogaparatayaiva padānāṃ svārtheṣu
GSP33mbrahsiu:3498: saṃsargajñānam? pravartakavacanāntarapravṛttidarśanena hi taddhetupratyayamanumāya tatra tasya sāmarthyaṃ gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3501: ‘caitragṛhe kṛśānuḥ'; iti, tadā tatastenānayanaṃ dṛṣṭvā gamyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3502: ‘ihānenāgnisattā pratītā, sā cāsmādvākyāt'; na ca śakyaṃ vaktum ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3506: arthāntarānvaye ca prayogapratyayopapattau na viśeṣānvaye pramāṇam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3510: pratipattividhau tulyaṃ yadi saiva prayojanam // MBs_2.92 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3513: hanta tarhi svarupe tanna vacaḥ paryavasati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3576: na hi vrīhyādisvarūpagrāhi pramāṇaṃ prayogaikadeśatāṃ bhajate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3581: dvitīyapratipattiviṣayo hi na tattvāvabodhaviṣayaḥ, kiṃ tu tadabhyāsaviṣayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3587: svātmasthitiḥ supraśāntā phalaṃ tanna vidheḥ padam // MBs_2.103 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3599: tasya ca viṣayo nānāpadārthasaṃsargātmā, tadanugamena pratīteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3600: tajjñānasya ca vividhārthamātrasaṃbhedāvabhāsasyātmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ dvaitaleśenāpyanavamṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ gocaraḥ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3609: ānandaḥ, etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrāmupajīvanti'; iti śrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3610: tathā ca tatsvarūpasthitirviśvāśivopaśamānniratiśayāhlādāvāpteśca suṣṭhu praśāntāparaḥ puruṣārthaḥ phalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3613: na ca puruṣārthe 'pyajñātopāye na pravartata iti yuktam, yataḥ pravṛtteḥ pūrvarūpamicchā
GSP33mbrahsiu:3616: tathā ‘yo hi yadicchati sa tatkaroti'; ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3617: api ca ajñātopāye cenna pravartate, avaśyamupāyajñāpanayā tatra pravartyaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:3619: tāvatā ca tatrāpi pravṛttisiddherna vidhāyakasya tatra vyāpāra āśrayitavyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3623: nanu phalavatyapyarthalakṣaṇā pravṛttiḥ, kva tarhi vidhivyāpāraḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3629: api ca apekṣitopāyataiva vidhiḥ, tasyā apravṛttapravartanālakṣaṇatvāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3631: iṣṭatāyāstatsādhanatāyāścānyasya pravṛttihetorabhāvāt, iṣṭatāyāśca pramāṇāntarāvaseyatvātsvayaṃ pravṛtteḥ jānātyevāsau ‘mayaitatkartavyam';
GSP33mbrahsiu:3634: ataḥ sā śabdapramāṇikā satī vidhiriti gīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3639: nanu adhyavasāyaḥ, ākūtam, ādyā pravṛttiḥ, kālatrayaviyuktaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:3640: pravṛttimātram, ajñātakriyākartṛsaṃbandha iti vidhivido vidhiṃ vyācakṣate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3649: na hi pratītimātreṇa ghaṭādayaḥ pravṛttihetava ityādi varṇitaṃ vidhiviveke /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3654: ‘mayedaṃ kartavyam'; iti yato 'dhyavasāyaḥ ‘niyukto 'smi'iti yato buddhiḥ sa niyogo vidhiśabdaparyāya iti, taṃ pratyucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3663: na hi taṃ parityajya laukikamalaukikakalpane pramāṇamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3679: sa hi niyoktṛdharmaḥ svatantro vā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3683: evamapi na tasyāṃ śabdaḥ pramāṇam,sākṣāttasya niyogābhidhāyitvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3688: tathā hi ‘gaurduhyatāṃ tvayā'; iti niyoge anyena dugdhāyāṃ na punardohamārabhate, viṣayasya kāryatāpratīteḥ tasya niṣpāditatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3696: tathā ‘sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṃkalpādevāsya pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhanti'; ityādi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3705: na ca mokṣaḥ phalaṃ tasya sādhyo mokṣo na cāparaḥ // MBs_2.105 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3707: vidyaiva cādvayā śāntā tadastamaya ucyate // MBs_2.106 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3710: iti darśanāt, sa prāgabhāvo na sādhyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3713: 'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyastāsāṃ mūrdhānamabhi nissṛtaikā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3717: yathā vā madhuni nānākusumarasānāṃ samudre ca nadīnāṃ prāptiravibhāgalakṣaṇā tathā syāt, ‘yathā loke madhukṛto madhu kurvanti';
GSP33mbrahsiu:3719: kāryasya vā kāraṇabhāvāpattiḥ, ‘tathā vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3720: tadrūpapariṇāmalakṣaṇā vā yogavyāghravat, ‘sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'; iti darśanāt ‘brahma saṃpadyata'; iti ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3728: ata eva ca na dvitīyaḥ, niravayavatvācca, ‘niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyam'iti
GSP33mbrahsiu:3736: na caturthaḥ, ananyatvādeva, caitanyasya ca brahmarūpasyāviśeṣāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3737: atha vijñānātmanāṃ śokamohādyabhāvo viśiṣyata iti cettatrāpi śokādayaścedātmāno vijñānātmanām, anucchedyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3738: atha guṇā arthāntaramāgamāpāyinaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ, kṣaṇikatvādeva cocchidyanta iti na tatsādhanamapekṣyam
GSP33mbrahsiu:3741: tatprāptistadrūpapariṇāmo mokṣaḥ, ‘sa svarāḍ bhavati'; iti śruteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3743: brahmaṇo nyūnaṃ samaṃ vā vijñānātmanām [KKS_121] aiśvaryaṃ syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3749: ‘atha ye 'nyathāto viduḥ, anyarājānaste kṣayyalokā bhavanti'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3752: ekaścetsarvādhipatiḥ sarvasya praśāsitā, paraḥ kiṃ kurvannīśaḥ syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3758: kāryāsiddhaścedaikamatye hetuḥ pariṣadvat, anyathā tasyāsiddheriti cet,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3770: tatra yathā malāpagame śuklameva sadvastraṃ ‘śuklaṃ jātam'ityucyate tathā mohāvaraṇavigame svarūpāvirbhāve ‘svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate'; ityucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3772: tadevaṃ svarūpasthitilakṣaṇatvānmohasya na kāryatā, prāgapi svarūpasya bhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3774: na cānyatvam, yato 'vidyāpagama evoktena prakāreṇa muktiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3778: atha viparyāsaḥ, tathāpi virodhitatattvajñānodaya eva tannivṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3779: na hi śuktikājñānotpādādanyā rajatajñānanivṛttistatsādhyā prayatnāntarasādhyā vā, tayoryaugapadyātprayatnāntarānapekṣaṇācca
GSP33mbrahsiu:3781: ‘brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'; iti, tathā ‘ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān, na
GSP33mbrahsiu:3783: tasmāttatsarvamabhavat'; ‘tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ';
GSP33mbrahsiu:3784: veda -- bhavati, vidvān -- na bibheti, ko mohaḥ -- paśyata iti paurvāparyāśravaṇāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3787: na, ekasyāpi vastuno bhāvābhāvarūpeṇa vyapadeśāt, tathā ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3788: ‘yadā ghaṭo naśyati tadā kapālāni jāyante'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3792: san brahmāpyeti'; ‘na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmanti, atraiva samavanīyante'; iti prāṇānutkramaṇena vijñānātmana evāgatirucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3793: na hi tadagamane tadupādhestasya brahmaṇo bhedena vijñānātmatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3794: yatra tu ‘manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ'; iti sopādhyupāsyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3797: ‘araśca ha vai ṇyaścārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyāmito [KKS_123] divi tadairaṃmadīyaṃ sarastadaśvatthaḥ somasavanastadaparājitā pūrbrahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ veśma'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3799: ‘ye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyaṃ tapa ityupāsate'; iti /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4166: yadi cakṣuṣā saṃprayuktaṃ śuktiśakalaṃ ‘na rajatam'; iti pratīyāt, rajataṃ vā tathā, na śuktikāśakala āditsayā pravarteta rajatārthī, tasya
GSP33mbrahsiu:4168: na ca smaryamāṇe rajate sā pravṛttiḥ, taddeśāsaṃnidheḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4169: na hi pratītimupagate 'pi vastuni yatra tasyāsaṃnidhistatra tenārthī pravartate /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4189: pravṛttiḥ, bhedāvabodhābhāvamātrādvā? pūrvasminviparyayaḥ, uttarasmin dṛśyamānādṛśyamānayoḥ saṃprayuktāsaṃprayuktayorvā na viśeṣaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4191: na hīndriyasaṃyogasya darśanasya vā kaścidagraha upayogaḥ, abhūtasamārope tvasti /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4208: tatra pūrvasmin smaraṇagocarayoravivekaḥ kutaḥ, svajñānādeva viviktatvāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4209: itarasminnapi sadā smṛtau viparyayaḥ syāt, sāmānyadarśane cānyasmṛtāvavivekāt /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4222: sāmānyadarśane 'pi kadācidekāṃ koṭiṃ smarato na saṃśayo na viparyayaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4224: ataḥ svajñānādeva tadā smṛtaṃ vivicyate, na dṛśyaviśeṣaparicchedāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4226: [KKS_140] api ca anyadeva smarataḥ pūrvarūpamekatvaṃ śaśini
GSP33mbrahsiu:4231: na ca sarvā niyogena bhrāntiḥ sādṛśyabandhanā // MBs_2.129 //

GSP33mbrahsiu:4235: bhrameṣu niyamo doṣādagrahe na bhrame yamaḥ // MBs_2.131 //

GSP33mbrahsiu:4241: agrahamātre tu doṣavyāpāre kāmilādidoṣādbhrāntiniyamo na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4254: sarvajñānāni mithyā ca prasajyante 'tra kalpane // MBs_2.137 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4261: sato tu viśeṣagrahaṇa indriyasaṃyukte sāmānyadarśane 'pi nāvivekaḥ, tata ubhayakoṭismaraṇe na saṃśayaḥ, ekasmṛtau na saṃśayo na viparyayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4262: evamapi dvayoḥ smaraṇe na viparyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4264: atha deśakālaviśeṣātsmaryamāṇaṃ vivicyate, tatra deśakālabhedāgraha iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4265: tanna, anantadeśakālabhedāvagataṃ taddeśāvagataṃ ca dṛśyātsmaryamāṇaṃ viviktaṃ gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4266: na ca deśakālabhedagrahaṇāt, anantasmaraṇānupapatteḥ, taddeśāvagate ca deśabhedābhāvāt
GSP33mbrahsiu:4267: atha smaryamāṇatayā agrahaṇādavivekaḥ smaryamāṇatājñānācca vivekaḥ, tasmāt
GSP33mbrahsiu:4269: paripūrṇaiva tarhi smṛtiḥ, na tayā svaviṣayasya kiñcinna gṛhītam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4270: svayameva sā svaviṣayaṃ dṛśyādvivinaktīti nāsti dṛśyamānasmaryamāṇayoravivekaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4271: yataḥ smarāmi iti jñānamanyadeva darśanasmaraṇavivekakāri smṛteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4273: smṛtiḥ svaviṣayaṃ vivinakti vā na vā? yadi vivinakti, tadā viparyayābhāvaḥ /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4276: na ‘smarāmi'iti vivekāccet, sa eva smṛteḥ svayamavivecakatvena syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4278: na cetsmṛteḥ pramāṇakāryātkāryaṃ viviktaṃ syāt, kena sā viviktā gamyeta?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4279: satyapi smṛtiviveke dṛṣṭaḥ pratyabhijñābhramaḥ ‘sa eva'; iti na ca
GSP33mbrahsiu:4280: pratyakṣasyāvivekaḥ, ekavivekenobhayorvikārātsmṛtādavivekācca smṛtivibhramaḥ syāt, na pratyakṣabhramaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:4284: athāsaṃnidhyagrahaṇāt, bhavatu sa svapnajñāne, natvindriyajāyāṃ bhrāntau /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4289: satyapi ca vivekajñāne pramāṇāntarād dvicandradiṅmohādyanugatirdṛṣṭeti nāgrahaṇamātraṃ viparyayaḥ
GSP33mbrahsiu:4292: ye ca khyātī tu rajataścakṣuḥsaṃyuktavastunoḥ // MBs_2.140 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4298: na krame yaugapadye vā vivekamatirīdṛśī // MBs_2.143 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4314: viparītā tu khyātiḥ saṃnihitasya rajatatāmabhūtāṃ rajatasya vā saṃnihitatāmādarśayantī prasañjayati
GSP33mbrahsiu:4319: na hi ‘nedaṃ rajatam'iti rajatamātraṃ cakṣuḥsaṃyuktavastumātraṃ vā

GSP33mbrahsiu:4325: sarvajñānānāmagrahabādhenotpattau ca vivekajñānamātramidaṃ na prasaktapratiṣedharūpamiti pratītyanusāriṇo 'nurūpam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4331: yaḥ smarati ca rajatasya, cakṣuḥsaṃyuktasya vastunaḥ sāmānyamātradarśī, na rajatādvivekaṃ gṛhṇāti, punaścakṣuḥprasādātpratyeti /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4365: na ca vyabhicāradoṣādasamarthapramāṇaṃ jñānamiti yujyate, pramāṇakāryasya paricchedasya jñānarūpādeva siddhatvāt /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4419: atha kāniciccakṣuḥsaṃyuktāni vastūni svena rūpeṇa gṛhyanta iti kasyacidagrahaṇe 'pi nānālambanatvam

GSP33mbrahsiu:4428_1: 'pi śaṅkyate jñānatvasāmānyāttathā cakṣuḥsaṃprayuktamapi vastu nāvikalarūpaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4429: ityagrahaṇe dṛṣṭānālambanatā grahaṇeṣvapi kasmānna śaṅkyate? doṣābhāvāditi
GSP33mbrahsiu:4430: cet, viparyaye 'pi tulyam, na cānyathālambane nirālambanatvam /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4445: adṛṣṭakalpanā yuktā na ca dṛṣṭasya saṃbhave /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4448: yathā avaghātaprokṣaṇādayaḥ svarūpeṇaiva dravyārthāḥ, dvitīyayā ca dravyasya karmatvena nirdeśāt, tathā jñānamapi svarūpeṇa parārtham /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4450: ato jñānaviṣayo 'pi vidhirātmarūpaṃ saṃspṛśati, na jñānamātre paryavasyati, jñānasyātmarūpārthatvena kartavyatāvagamājjñānaniyogenaivātmarūpasyākṣepāt /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4460: tatra yathā ‘vrīhīn prokṣati'iti prokṣaṇavidhereva vrīhiṣvadṛṣṭasaṃskārāvagamaḥ prokṣaṇaviṣayādapi
GSP33mbrahsiu:4462: na hi tatra kiñcidakurvatprokṣaṇaṃ tadarthaṃ kṛtaṃ syādityevaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:4464: nānyathā svargakāmasya yāgakartavyatāpratītiryujyate yadi na svargopāyo yāgaḥ /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4468: na hi tadvidhamātmānamuddiśyajñānaniyogo yujyate, atadvidhaścedātmā tena jñānena pratīyata iti /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4513: yadi tāvadasamyaggrahaṇamātraṃ tadapaṭutvaṃ vā jñānasya kenaciddrūpeṇa vā

GSP33mbrahsiu:4583: jñānaṃ yadi ca dṛṣṭārthaṃ prāptaṃ dṛṣṭata eva tat /

GSP33mbrahsiu:4661: tathā ca ‘tattu samanvayāt'iti codanālakṣaṇāddharmāttuśabdena viśeṣyaṃ brahma samanvayagamyamuktam

GSP33mbrahsiu:4726: api cājñānataḥ śokī duḥkhī jīvaḥ prakāśate // MBs_4.6 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4731: na ca pravṛttiniṣṭhatvaṃ tathāsmin kena vāryate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4732: jñeyasya puruṣārthatvaṃ tatra cedatra tatsamam // MBs_4.9 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4738: na khalu hitopādānāhitahāne eva pramāṇaphale; upekṣāmapi hi pramāṇaphalaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:4740: na ca puruṣārthatā pramāṇalakṣaṇam, pramāhetutvaṃ tu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4743: viśuddhabrahmātmano jīvasya mithyājñānam; etannivṛttirūpaṃ ca viśuddhānandaprakāśabrahmātmatatvajñānam
GSP33mbrahsiu:4745: yadyapi ca saṃskārāttasyānuvṛttistathāpi śābdajñānamanusaṃtanvato viduṣo na pūrvavadbhavati nivartate cātyantāya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4746: dṛṣṭā ca jñānotpattereva puruṣārthatā kvacit kutūhalākulitānāmajñāte'rthe
GSP33mbrahsiu:4748: na ca pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayasyaiva puruṣārthateti niyamaḥ; pratyakṣādīni hi pramāṇāni; na ca tāvatpravṛttinivṛttiparāṇi siddhavastuviṣayāṇi; na ca puruṣārthatāṃ jahati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4750: pratyakṣādijñeyaṃ hi siddhaṃ vastu puruṣārthaḥ salilādiḥ, tadupakārāt;
GSP33mbrahsiu:4752: atrāpi ca śabdaprameyaṃ svayameva brahma puruṣārtho jarādivividhāśivopaśamāt paramānandaprakāśatvācca suprasannam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4753: ata eva 'tattvamasi'iti śvetaketumukhenāśāsanīyāya puruṣāya śrutyābhinnamupadiśyate; abhinnaṃ hi tadanuśāsanīyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4755: tattve tādātmyajñāne ca tathābhāvāt viśvāśivopaśamāt paramaśivabhāvācca paripūrṇaḥ puruṣārtho āpto bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4762: sadyaḥ prakṣālayantī ghanamapi jagatāṃ tīrthadustarkapaṅkaṃ vyākhyātotkhātaviśvā śivaniratiśayaśreyase brahmasiddhiḥ // MBs_4.12 //
